title: David Carr's top 5 current WR & have we seen the best of Drew Brees?
itunes:title: David Carr's top 5 current WR & have we seen the best of Drew Brees?
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by our other favorite Dave - David Carr! The guys first get into David's brother Derek getting a chance to be on HBO's Hard Knocks (2:36) and how he gets along with his new teammates like Richie Incognito (6:36). Next, the guys get into how will the older quarterbacks in the NFL such as Tom Brady & Drew Brees fair this year and if their age will catch up to them (17:29)? They round out the show with David talking about his current top 5 NFL wide receiver list and the surprising name he left off (37:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
